Description: Toolkit for processing sequences in FASTA/Q formats
Galaxy tool ids: seqtk_comp, seqtk_cutN, seqtk_dropse, seqtk_fqchk, seqtk_hety, seqtk_listhet, seqtk_mergefa, seqtk_mergepe, seqtk_mutfa, seqtk_randbase, seqtk_sample, seqtk_seq, seqtk_subseq, seqtk_telo, seqtk_trimfq
bio.tool description: A tool for processing sequences in the FASTA or FASTQ format. It parses both FASTA and FASTQ files which can also be optionally compressed by gzip.
